rooms.description: Wide entrance with Kerala traditional design elements and a water feature for Vastu balance.
Spacious living area with intricately carved woodwork, Kerala-style detailing, comfortable seating and a central view of the courtyard.
Traditional dining space integrated within the living room or adjacent, emphasizing natural light and airy ambiance.
Spacious master bedroom with Kerala wooden carvings, private balcony overlooking the courtyard, built in north-east direction for Vastu alignment.
A serene second bedroom featuring traditional motifs and soft natural light, ideal for children or guest use.
Cozy third bedroom with Kerala-style decor, balancing privacy with natural ventilation.
Fully equipped kitchen designed in a compact but functional layout, with integrated storage and a small prep area for traditional cooking methods.
Servants' quarters located conveniently near the kitchen, ensuring easy access while maintaining privacy.
Primary bathroom with modern fixtures integrated in traditional design aesthetics.
Dedicated home theater space with soundproofing and ambient lighting, designed for an immersive viewing experience.

openings.description: Traditional wooden entrance door with carved motifs, ensuring a welcoming Vastu-compliant entry.
Windows around the central courtyard to allow natural light and airflow in accordance with Kerala design principles.
Balconies adjoining master bedroom and living areas, promoting open space and connectivity with the courtyard.

courtyard.description: A central open courtyard with water bodies, potted plants, and traditional Kerala stone work to balance energies as per Vastu principles.

rooms.description: Additional bedroom ensuring a balanced layout with natural light and privacy, complementing the traditional Kerala style.
A dedicated study or office space, designed for quiet work and reflection, aligned with Vastu principles of productivity.

openings.description: Balcony windows overlooking the courtyard, ensuring consistent natural light and ventilation on all floors.
